name: Power Word: Pong
description:
"PONG!", yelled the wizard, his spell readied and his will as mighty as his magic.

Recently added: new, more difficult AI players!

A reinvention of the classical Pong! Take a side on this epic encounter between the Ice and the Fire factions, place your wizards tactically to control the field and win this duel of minds and magic!

The game can be played by zero, one or two players. There are three difficulty levels for single player games. Can you beat the Archmagi team?

Developed during the November 2017 GameDev.net challenge and the Game Off jam. Source code available in Github.
